title: Evil Was Watching
description: Two young girls in Washington are snatched in broad daylight while riding their bikes. The case goes unsolved for decades, until a new detective with a local connection to the story tries to solve the mystery that haunted her childhood. Keith Morrison reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
